column1: Funeral Services will be held on Monday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 A.M. at Fletcher Funeral & Cremation Services
column5: 254 E. Main St. in Westminster.  Interment will be in Evergreen Memorial Gardens. The family will receive friends at the funeral home on Sunday from 2-4 and 6-8 P.M. Gamber Community Volunteer Fire Department will conduct a Memorial Sunday
